Name: Geocode
Description: Geocodes are used to express the latitude and longitude of a given location. This allows them to be placed accurately on a map.

Properties.Name: Elevation
Properties.Description: The elevation (above mean sea level) for this point.

Properties.Name: Latitude
Properties.Description: Enter latitude in decimal notation. Positive numbers are North, negative numbers are South.

Properties.Name: Longitude
Properties.Description: Enter longitude in decimal notation. Positive numbers are East, negative numbers are West.
